alert.note: Alert for Nemaha; Osage; Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 23 at 2:24PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, Shawnee, northern Douglas, north central Osage, southeastern Nemaha, Jackson and southern Brown Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 223 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles south of Goff to near Berryton. Movement was northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Topeka, Lawrence, Holton, Horton, Carbondale, Valley Falls, Oskaloosa, Tecumseh, Richland, Perry, McLouth, Meriden, Hoyt, Ozawkie, Nortonville, Lecompton, Clinton, Winchester, Wetmore and Mayetta. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 353 and 355. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 171 and 206. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
